page.title: 14TRANSPORT-DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: {Rail}A line runs through Dunton Green to Charing Cross, another runs through Otford to Victoria station,London. They meet at Sevenoaks to the South. {Roads}The old London-South coast route(A21) went through D.G.In the mid 60s the Sevenoaks/Tonbridge bypass was built and the London road was re- numbered A2028. Heavy traffic was re- duced. Motorway constructon has taken place since the mid-1970's E-W across the area(M25/M26). The link between the{M25/M26}and A21 will be completed in 1986 and known as the{Chevening { interchange.}It is hoped that by the end of the decade there will be east- facing access(only west-facing access at present). Otford made successful appeals against east-facing access to the Otford road(A225). The Dept. of Transport will reconsider those omitted from the Chevening interchange
